org.t2health.lib.activity
Class BaseNavigationActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.j256.ormlite.android.apptools.OrmLiteBaseActivity<DatabaseOpenHelper>
          org.t2health.lib.activity.BaseActivity
              org.t2health.lib.activity.BaseSecurityActivity
                  org.t2health.lib.activity.BaseNavigationActivity
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseQAManagerActivity, BaseQAQuestionActivity, ConfigureActivity, ForgotPasswordActivity, UnlockActivity, WebViewActivity, XMLItemsBrowserActivity
public abstract class BaseNavigationActivity
extends BaseSecurityActivity

A base class that is used for basic navigation through the app. It provides a left (typically back) button, a right button and a title with a formatted background. The left button of this activity is by default configured to act as a "back" button. Pressing this will set the result to RESULT_BACK and finish the activity.

Author:
robbiev

EXTRA_TITLE_VISIBILITY

public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_TITLE_VISIBILITY
The visibility of the title text. This is excepted to be an int and standard view visibility attributes are accepted. (eg View.VISIBLE, View.INVISIBLE, View.GONE, etc)

EXTRA_LEFT_BUTTON_VISIBILITY

public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_LEFT_BUTTON_VISIBILITY
The visibility of the left button. This is excepted to be an int and standard view visibility attributes are accepted. (eg View.VISIBLE, View.INVISIBLE, View.GONE, etc) The default is "Back"

See Also:

The result code that will be send when the left button is pressed and its method is not overriden.
